name: Malca-Amit
0:
”Alexa, ask My Malca What are my incoming shipments?”
”What is the address of Malca-Amit branch in New York?”
”What is the upcoming Malca-Amit show?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my malca
des:
Malca-Amit Alexa provides a fast and easy way to manage your logistics needs. Whether you’re away from the office, or simply don’t have a computer, you now have the ability to real-time updates on your shipments, trade shows, news, and so much more!

When you start using Malca-Amit Alexa you will be able to:
 - Track shipments
 - Locate Malca-Amit branches
 - Check upcoming shows and events
 - Check your account balance
 - Ask about your incoming shipments
 - Create (domestic) express shipment
